desc: No great story ever started with a salad, so most Degens like us are unlikely to eat them. This creates a nutrition gap in your diet, and a need for supplements. Get the same vital nutrition you would in a beet and exotic mushroom salad, from a delicious beverage that costs less than 2$. Meet Degen Daily Boost.

layout.text: Recover from long nights faster, restore your immune system, and energize with clean caffeine and cognitive enhancers. You accomplish all of the above with one serving of Degen Daily Boost.
